features: Includes two (2) Colgate 360 Optic White Advanced Soft Adult Toothbrushes, Whitening Toothbrush Pack
The whitening toothbrush helps remove surface stains from teeth
A comfortable ergonomic handle and thumb grip design on this Colgate Optic White toothbrush helps with maneuvering to clean all areas of your mouth
A multi-action bristle design with tooth-fitting polishing cups helps to remove more plaque between teeth (vs. an ordinary flat trim toothbrush)
Soft bristles on this soft toothbrush help effectively clean gums and teeth
The adult manual toothbrush helps remove bacteria from teeth, tongue, cheeks, and gums.
body.description: The Colgate 360 Optic White Advanced Adult Soft Whitening Toothbrush is a manual toothbrush made for easy brushing. This Colgate soft toothbrush for adults is designed with whitening cups to remove teeth stains and special polishing soft bristles to whiten teeth. Plus, a unique cheek and tongue cleaner removes odor-causing bacteria for a 360 toothbrushing experience! The Colgate Optic White toothbrush features multi-action, tooth-fitting polishing cups to remove surface stains. An ergonomic handle design fits comfortably in your hand while flexible finger grips help these adult toothbrushes to stay in place; reducing slippage and allowing for more precise maneuvering as you brush your teeth. At Colgate, we make products that promote healthy smiles. Not only because having a healthy smile is important to your overall health, but because when you have a healthy smile, you actually smile more – and that’s a powerful thing. Smiles are the simplest form of optimism, something we need now more than ever. That’s why we’re championing optimism – we are committed to creating a healthier planet and working every day to create healthy smiles for all. Everyone has the right to a bright smile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are my favorite toothbrushes! They are easy to hold while brushing and I feel do a great job cleaning. I am on blood thinners and but soft brushes and these are soft but sturdy too, no bleeding either! Great toothbrush!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my second time purchasing the tooth brushes. I and my husband were told to use soft toothbrushes and these are the best. Usually soft toothbrushes wear out fast but these are long lasting. We also use it with Colgate optic white pro series toothpaste that you can get on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this toothbrush for a while now and it is not too soft or too hard. It has just the right amount of stiffness. At first it will feel kind of stiff but once you use it for a little while it will soften out on its own after like a week or two. I will definitely be purchasing again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good standard tooth brush

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft bristle for delicate gums

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The best toothbrush I have used so far. Couldn't find anything better manual or electric so I went back to using this. Will not be trying new brushes anymore. If it works, it works.Excellent at removing plague and keeping plague in check. Gives the best squeaky clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have had a lot of toothbrushes over the years. This is actually my favorite so far!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried many different brands and styles of toothbrushes and this one if by far my favorite. Soft bristles with varying length help surround your teeth for a more comprehensive clean. The tongue scraper also works well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Pretty nice quality, ergonomics.. It says soft but is still hard for first few uses.
reviews.reviewText: The product is nice to hold onto good design ergonomically.. also the cheek and tounge cleaner on the back does work.. but the bristles are hard in the first few uses... but still feel harder than a soft bristle ones... like a medium
Frankly Speaking when I buy sold and ship by amazon I feel very comfortable and confident because I know for fact Amazon will not compromise their name for any reason
Small toothbrush that is kids size and it is not soft as described.
